props.description:
The content of the tabs component.
This prop accepts one or more Tabs.Item components or other React nodes.
props.title: children

props.description:
Sets the indicated tab as active by default.
If unset, defaults to the first tab. This prop should be a number representing the index of the tab.
props.title: preSelectedTab

props.description: Controls where the tab buttons are displayed. This prop accepts one of the following values: "left", "center", or "right".
props.title: position

props.description: Determines whether the tabs should occupy the full width of their container.
props.title: full

props.description: Determines whether the tabs should have an underline style.
props.title: underlined

props.description: Label of the tabpanel. Used to pair with it's corresponding tab control.
props.title: label

props.description: The content of the tabs item.
props.title: children

props.description:
A callback function that is called when a tab is clicked.
This function receives the index of the selected tab as a parameter.
props.title: onSelectTab
